verses.name: Revelation 3:5
verses.text: He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.

verses.name: Revelation 3:6
verses.text: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.

verses.name: Revelation 3:7
verses.text: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write; These things saith he that is holy, he that is true, he that hath the key of David, he that openeth, and no man shutteth; and shutteth, and no man openeth;
